Be Human ( Philosophy )
Being human is a lot more complicated than just surviving long enough to reproduce . We all seek a purpose in life and hope to thrive . This will show you step by step what you have to do to be human . These steps/parts do n’t need to be followed in any particular order ( with the exception of part 0 being first ) . *Written for a school project*
Steps
Sustain Long Term Survival And Security
Before you worry about the semantics of the human condition , make sure you can take care of your physical and safety needs first . These requirements are the first two levels of Maslov ’s Hierarchy of Needs , which is another important aspect in being human . You need to make sure you are able to get sufficient daily nutrients and water , along with appropriate shelter for you environment . Once you physical needs are taken care of you need to make sure you are as safe as possible . Living in an area plagued with crime or war will jeopardize your survival , so it ’s important to live in a safe and stable place .
Establish A Sense Of Self
Begin to worry about being not just another animal , but a human being . And to be a human you need to have an identity . Being human is a lot more than just being another member of a group of animals working together for survival , it ’s about being your own individual person . Figuring out exactly who you are can be tricky though , and is often something that takes a long time . It is important not to rush in deciding who you are . Always remember that people can change , it ’s very likely you will be a different person at different times in your life and that ’s okay . The step below outline how you can go about finding out who you are
Figure out what you like and potentially what you want to do with your life . Find something your passionate about and ask if it ’s something you could gear your life towards . Spend time reading and explore different environments to see what you like . For example , if you know you love food and preparing food , maybe consider taking some cooking classes , and if you ’re still young , consider studying culinary arts after high school .
Travel . Travel is very important in developing a sense of self because it exposes you to a large variety of cultures and environments . After seeing different cultures and areas , you can decide where you think you belong . Maybe a certain country would be a more appropriate place for you to live in than the one you currently reside in .
Find role models . It ’s hard to figure out who you want to be from scratch , having role models can help you to understand who you might want to be .
Develop Relationships
Relationships are incredibly important and one of the most fundamental parts of the human experience . No Man is an island , it ’s important to have people you can trust and have fun with .
Find like-minded people who share your interests . One of the best ways to start a friendship is to find something to do together . This allows for bonding and can make an activity a lot more enjoyable . A good way to meet people with similar interests is to join a club or sports team .
Develop strong relationships with your family . Your family is a good place to develop lasting relationships since most people are very close with their families and live with them . Find something you like to do or something you like to talk about with someone in your family . For example , if your grandfather likes to play the same kinds of board games you do , set some time aside to create a game night .
Find love and consider starting a family . Friends and family are great , but it ’s also important to have someone in your life that you love romantically and can share your life with . Love is a very important part of the human experience , and people who are married often have benefits that other people do not .
Find Your Purpose In Life
Finding purpose can be a difficult thing to do , especially when there ’s the possibility that we live in a purposeless world . It ’s important to find a reason for your existence , and something that fulfills you as a person .
Think about how you want to be remembered . A good way to figure out what your purpose should be is to think about how people will view what you ’ve done after you ’ve died . This will give you an idea of what you should gear your life towards . For example , if you think the most important thing you could do for society is to contribute to scientific understanding , then find some way to work in a setting devoted towards scientific progress .
Find something that ’s fulfilling and enjoyable . Everyone does n’t need to be or aspire to be the man who cures cancer , or solves world hunger , your purpose can be found in what you love to do . For example , if you love computers and video games maybe consider making a blog or writing reviews .
